definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

pinyin: bo1 re3 bo1 luo2 mi4 duo1 xin1 jing1

sentences.english: You Do not suspicious, he is accustomed to the parsimonious .
sentences.chinese: 你別多心，他就是儉省慣了的。
真誠的友誼是不多心的。

sentences.english: Don't get me wrong, I am speaking in general.
sentences.chinese: 你別多心，我只是就一般而論。

sentences.english: Please don't think more I only mention it generally.
sentences.chinese: 你別多心，我只是就一般而論。

sentences.english: Don't think over, I am in terms of the general.
sentences.chinese: 你別多心，我只是就一般而論。

sentences.english: Don't think too much. I just speak in general.
sentences.chinese: 你別多心，我只是就一般而論。

sentences.english: “Jeff, maybe you’re overthinking this, ” Abnesti said.
sentences.chinese: “傑夫，沒準是你對這事太多心了，”艾博說。

sentences.english: May also be the reason I am suspicious now.
sentences.chinese: 可能也是我多心的原因吧。

definition: to mind/to brood over/to be concerned about
to imagine that one's love is reciprocated/to shower affection on an uninterested party
to worry/to be on one's mind
talkative/to speak out of turn/to blab/to shoot one's mouth off/rumors fly
to bother about/to haggle/to bicker/to argue/plan/stratagem
